content: **knitted neck-warmer and hat in drops melody and drops puna the piece is worked in rib and stocking stitch ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see the polar charm hat pattern here 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #polarcharmset drops design pattern ml-134 yarn group b + d or e ------------------------------------------------------- * **whole set** **sizes** s/m - l/xl **yarn for whole set** drops melody from garnstudio belongs to yarn group d 150-150 g colour 01 off white and use drops puna from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 150-200 g colour 01 off white ------------------------------------------------------- * **neck-warmer** **sizes** s/m - l/xl length from shoulder 32-34 cm width 37-38 cm **yarn for neck-warmer** drops melody from garnstudio belongs to yarn group d 100-100 g colour 01 off white and use drops puna from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-150 g colour 01 off white **needles for neck-warmer** drops circular needle size 6 mm length 60 cm drops circular needle size 5 mm length 40 cm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size **knitting gauge for neck-warmer** 13 stitches in width and 17 row in height with stocking stitch and 1 strand of each quality on needle size 6 mm= 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches within 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches within 10 cm change to a smaller needle size 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/261-12-polar-charm-hat
